abstract: Andrea Carla Michaels and Patrick Blindauer spend Sunday at the movies.
snippet: Andrea Carla Michaels and Patrick Blindauer spend Sunday at the movies.
lead_paragraph: SUNDAY'S PUZZLE - Right off the bat I knew I would like this one. For one thing, it's the brainchild of two constructors I find very entertaining, Andrea Carla Michaels and Patrick Blindauer. It's also about Hollywood movies. Now that's entertainment.

headline.main: Sunday: Hollywood From Right to Left
